page.title: 11 THE FRIARS,AYLESFORD
page.content: The{Friars at Aylesford}is a lovely,quiet place. It consists of lots of different chapels: for instance the quiet chapel and the chapel of the martyrs.There is also the Rosary walk where you walk and make silent prayer or say the rosary. The monks at the friary are very kind.They are{Franciscan.}There is a beautiful altar in the middle of the Friars where lots of masses are held: it is a large open air chapel and the people sit on benches. The Friars is situated on the North bank of the{River Medway}and has a coffee shop and a souvenir shop. To get to the friary one has to cross an old bridge and go through the old village of{Aylesford.} by Clare Fisher
